label: 正倉院
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: A repository of precious objects established by Emperor Shōmu (r. 749-58), which still survives in the Tōdaiji precincts (p. 504n). [聖武天皇、東大寺]
